title: CANCELED | Member Lecture: Rembrandt Portraits
hero_caption: Rembrandt Harmenszoon van Rijn (Workshop of). Young Woman at an Open Half-Door, 1645. Mr. and Mrs. Martin A. Ryerson Collection.
header_description: Due to an unexpected illness, today's member lecture on Rembrandt Portraits is canceled.
description:
If you are still interested in attending a Member Lecture on Rembrandt, seats are available for our March 12 lecture.

Join Rebecca Long, Patrick G. and Shirley W. Ryan Associate Curator of European Painting and Sculpture, for a look at the life and works of the Dutch Golden Age artist.

For additional member programs, please visit the member programs calendar.

Persons with disabilities who would like to request an accessibility accommodation for an Art Institute program are encouraged to send an email to access@artic.edu or call (312) 499-4111 as far in advance as possible.
